Trade/Device Name(s): FLEX Monoclonal Mouse Anti-Human Progesterone Receptor, Clone PgR 1294, Ready-to-Use (Dako Omnis)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for FLEX Monoclonal Mouse Anti-Human Progesterone Receptor, Clone PgR 1294, Ready-to-Use (Dako Omnis) for qualitative detection of progesterone receptor in breast cancer tissue using immunohistochemistry on Dako Omnis.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for use in immunohistochemistry with the EnVision FLEX visualization system and Dako Omnis instrument to qualitatively detect human progesterone receptor in formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded tissue sections of human breast cancer, aiding in assessment of progesterone receptor status in breast carcinomas.
